dt: {bc}a chariot drawn by four horses abreast

et: Latin, singular of {it}quadrigae{/it} team of four, contraction of {it}quadrijugae{/it}, feminine plural of {it}quadrijugus{/it} yoked four abreast, from {it}quadri-{/it} + {it}jungere{/it} to yoke, join {ma}{mat|yoke|}{/ma}
shortdef: a chariot drawn by four horses abreast
